settings.heading: Our Happiness Guarantee
settings.textarea:
We want you to be totally thrilled with your Cover-Up products. If you're not happy with your purchase for any
reason, opened or unopened products can be returned for a refund or exchanged for a full 60 days after you order.

settings.title: Not What You Expected?
settings.text: We've all been there... Whether you've ordered the wrong size, or it's just not what you were expecting, we've got you covered.

settings.title: Damaged or Defective?
settings.text: We endeavour to make our products with the utmost quality and care, but occasionally something might slip through the cracks. If your product is faulty, or has been damaged in transit we'll offer to send you a replacement free of charge.

settings.title: Green Returns
settings.text:
Weâ€™re proud to offer Green Returns, which reduces shipping and processing waste (and saves you a trip to the post office, too).

We'll only ask you to return a product when it's strictly necessary. For example, if we've sent you the wrong product by mistake we allow you to keep the product (or pass it on to someone who might enjoy it more). Simple, right?
Do you have any another questions that we haven't answered above? Please feel free to reach out to our friendly team with your queries - help@cover-up.com
